name: dvrplus
short_description:
This is a Task scheduler/video capturing tool.This gives a library and
a application.library gives APIs written in java and python.Supports capturing from tv tuner cards/DVB/DVR cards,support GPS and Set Top box device simulator for l4tv architecture
